title: Coronavirus: Germany says its outbreak is 'under control'
description: The number of new infections has fallen significantly in Germany, where testing is at a high level.
content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 Germany has brought the infection rate down considerably
Germany's health minister says the month-long lockdown has brought his country's coronavirus outbreak under control.
